description.en:
BnbRain, community driven protocol that offers highest BNB Yields with BnbRain frictionless reward! Core functions of BNBRAIN are auto liquidity function and a passive disbursement yield whereby 18% of every sell transfer equally will be redistributed to the BRAIN BNB holders.
The longer you hold $BRAIN tokens, the more you earn in rewards! Simply buy & hold $BRAIN and you’ll get 18% BNB airdropped to your wallet every 4 hours automagically!
